Key Match Events: Cleveland Guardians clinched a playoff berth
The Twins walked off again in extra innings
Pre-Game Insights: The Twins are tied with the red-hot Detroit Tigers
This was the third game of a four-game series between the two teams
Post-Match Reflections: The Twins head to Boston to try to turn things around
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins and Tigers are now tied for the final wild card spot in the American League
The Twins have the tiebreaker over the Tigers, Mariners and Royals
